EmailTemplate.description: Email notification on Closed date for Opportunity
EmailTemplate.name: Notification - Opportunity Close Date
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} has passed its expected Close Date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
The expected close date of '{!Opportunity.Name}' (associated with {!Opportunity.Account} ) has now passed. Please login to Salesforce and update this Opportunity.
